title: Vitalitik
author: Vitalitik
content: Silo finance is the first DeFi platform that i can actually understand, and is safe due to their isolated risk model. I can actually see myself making money with DeFi strategies as you can borrow or loan against any crypto really easily.https://silo.finance

comments.author: fantraun18h
comments.body: Publicly disclosing the investment fund and development team is crucial in the current cryptocurrency market. Silofinance project is currently not achieving that, as only when the investment fund and development team are made transparent can newcomers feel confident in using the project's products

comments.author: Vitalitik
comments.body: been using it a lot , you can loan for example pepe to buy eth on lev
